summary: Frontend testing completed for Happy Place Coffee Menu page. All core features are working correctly including card layout, customization options, cart functionality, and sidebar navigation.
test_credentials: None required - all data is mocked
context_for_next_testing_agent: All menu page features tested and working. Key test results: 1) Card width is 280px (correct), 2) Image height is 160px (h-40), 3) Size buttons min-width ~77px (>58px), 4) Best Seller badges visible, 5) Customize Your Drink button on ALL cards, 6) Full customization (milk, add-ons, syrups, sauces, shots, toppings) shows for Best Sellers/Coffee & Espresso/Cappuccino/Custom Drip categories, 7) Only Special Instructions shows for Cold Brew & Signature/Frappés/Tea Options/Non-Coffee categories, 8) Special Instructions hidden when collapsed, visible when expanded, 9) Character limit 150 enforced with counter, 10) Expanded cards don't cause row stretching, 11) Cart displays correctly with items, 12) Sidebar navigation scrolls to sections correctly.
